name: Counter-Strike: Classic Offensive
author: support@moongetsu.ro
description: Counter-Strike: Classic Offensive (CSCO) is a CS:GO mod that brings back the classic Counter-Strike 1.6 atmosphere and gameplay with modern graphics. It includes weapons, maps and gameplay mechanics from CS 1.6, along with enhanced 3D models and updated visual effects. Perfect for players who want to experience CS 1.6 nostalgia in a modern environment.

            "tv_enable": "tv_enable 1",

            "sv_maxrate": "sv_maxrate \"100000\"",
            "sv_mincmdrate": "sv_mincmdrate \"128\"",
            "sv_maxcmdrate": "sv_maxcmdrate \"128\"",
            "sv_minupdaterate": "sv_minupdaterate \"128\"",
            "sv_maxupdaterate": "sv_maxupdaterate \"128\"",

            "sv_client_max_interp_ratio": "sv_client_max_interp_ratio \"2\"",
            "net_maxcleartime": "net_maxcleartime 0.001",
            "net_splitrate": "net_splitrate \"2\"",
            "sv_parallel_sendsnapshot": "sv_parallel_sendsnapshot \"0\"",
            "sv_hibernate_when_empty": "sv_hibernate_when_empty \"0\"",
            "sv_pure": "sv_pure 0",
            "sv_lan": "sv_lan 0",
            "sv_allowupload": "sv_allowupload \"0\"",
            "sv_allowdownload": "sv_allowdownload \"1\"",
            "sv_downloadurl": "sv_downloadurl \"Your Download URL\"",
            "fps_max": "fps_max 0",
            "bot_quota": "bot_quota 0",
            "bot_kick": "bot_kick",
            "host_name_store": "host_name_store 1",
            "host_info_show": "host_info_show 1",
            "host_players_show": "host_players_show 2",
            "sv_max_dropped_packets_to_process": "sv_max_dropped_packets_to_process 0",
            "sv_max_queries_sec": "sv_max_queries_sec \"60\"",
            "sv_max_queries_sec_global": "sv_max_queries_sec_global \"60\"",
            "sv_max_queries_window": "sv_max_queries_window \"60\"",
            "sv_tags": "sv_tags \"your, server, tags\""
        }
    }
}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# =============================================
# Counter-Strike: Classic Offensive Server Setup
# =============================================
# Server Files Location: /mnt/server

echo '------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------'
echo '███╗   ███╗ ██████╗  ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗ ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ███████╗██╗   ██╗███████╗████████╗███████╗███╗   ███╗███████╗'
echo '████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝██║   ██║    ██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝████╗ ████║██╔════╝'
echo '██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║   ███████╗██║   ██║    ███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗   ██║   █████╗  ██╔████╔██║███████╗'
echo '██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║   ╚════██║██║   ██║    ╚════██║  ╚██╔╝  ╚════██║   ██║   ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╔╝██║╚════██║'
echo '██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║   ███████║╚██████╔╝    ███████║   ██║   ███████║   ██║   ███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████║'
echo '╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝     ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝'
echo '------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------'

echo "🚀  Starting server installation process..."
echo "============================================="

## Install required packages
echo "📦  Installing required packages..."
echo "    - Checking package manager..."
if command -v apt-get &> /dev/null; then
    echo "    - Using apt-get package manager"
    echo "    - Updating package lists..."
    apt-get update
    echo "    - Installing unzip package..."
    apt-get install -y unzip
elif command -v yum &> /dev/null; then
    echo "    - Using yum package manager"
    yum install -y unzip
elif command -v apk &> /dev/null; then
    echo "    - Using apk package manager"
    apk add unzip
else
    echo "❌ Could not install unzip. No supported package manager found."
    exit 1
fi
echo "✅ Package installation completed"

## Debug information
echo "🔍  Debug Information:"
echo "    - Working Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "    - Server Directory: /mnt/server"
echo "    - System Information:"
echo "      * OS: $(cat /etc/os-release | grep PRETTY_NAME | cut -d'"' -f2)"
echo "      * Architecture: $(uname -m)"
echo "      * Kernel: $(uname -r)"
echo "    - Environment Variables:"
env | grep -E "CUSTOM|SERVER|PTERO" | sort

## Create necessary directories
echo "📁  Creating server directories..."
echo "    - Creating /mnt/server directory..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server
echo "    - Changing to /mnt/server directory..."
cd /mnt/server
echo "    - Current directory: $(pwd)"

## Check disk space
echo "💾  Checking available disk space..."
required_space=5000 # 5GB in MB
available_space=$(df -m / | awk 'NR==2 {print $4}')
echo "    - Required space: ${required_space}MB"
echo "    - Available space: ${available_space}MB"
if [ "$available_space" -lt "$required_space" ]; then
    echo "❌ Insufficient disk space. Required: ${required_space}MB, Available: ${available_space}MB"
    exit 1
fi
echo "✅ Disk space check passed"

## Validate download URL
echo "🔍  Validating download URL..."
if [ -z "${CUSTOM_DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
    echo "❌ CUSTOM_DOWNLOAD_URL environment variable is not set"
    echo "💡  This variable should be set in your Pterodactyl egg configuration"
    echo "    Please check your egg configuration in the Pterodactyl panel"
    exit 1
fi
echo "✅ Download URL validated: ${CUSTOM_DOWNLOAD_URL}"

## Download custom files with error handling and progress
echo "⬇️   Downloading server files..."
echo "📥  Download URL: ${CUSTOM_DOWNLOAD_URL}"
echo "    - Starting download..."
if ! curl -L --progress-bar -o /mnt/server/cscoserver.zip "${CUSTOM_DOWNLOAD_URL}" 2>&1; then
    echo "❌ Failed to download server files"
    echo "💡  Possible solutions:"
    echo "   - Verify the download URL in your egg configuration"
    echo "   - Check if the URL is accessible from the server"
    echo "   - Ensure the file exists at the source location"
    echo "   - Check your network connection"
    exit 1
fi
echo "✅ Download completed"

## Verify download size
echo "🔍  Verifying downloaded file..."
if [ ! -s /mnt/server/cscoserver.zip ]; then
    echo "❌ Downloaded file is empty or corrupted"
    exit 1
fi
file_size=$(ls -lh /mnt/server/cscoserver.zip | awk '{print $5}')
echo "✅ File verification passed (Size: ${file_size})"

## Extract downloaded files with error handling
echo "📂  Extracting server files..."
echo "    - Starting extraction..."
if ! unzip -q /mnt/server/cscoserver.zip -d /mnt/server; then
    echo "❌ Failed to extract server files"
    exit 1
fi
echo "✅ Extraction completed"

## Set proper permissions
echo "🔒  Setting up permissions..."
echo "    - Setting permissions to 755..."
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server
echo "    - Setting HOME environment variable..."
export HOME=/mnt/server
echo "✅ Permissions set successfully"

## Cleanup
echo "🧹  Cleaning up temporary files..."
echo "    - Removing downloaded zip file..."
rm -f /mnt/server/cscoserver.zip
echo "✅ Cleanup completed"

echo "============================================="
echo "✅ Server installation completed successfully!"
echo "============================================="echo "📋 Installation Summary:"
echo "   - Server files installed in: /mnt/server"
echo "   - Server IP: ${SERVER_IP}"
echo "   - Server Port: ${SERVER_PORT}"
echo "   - Server Location: ${P_SERVER_LOCATION}"
echo "============================================="

ls -la /tmp

variables.name: Default Map
variables.description: The initial map that will be loaded when the server starts. Popular choices include de_dust2_csco, de_inferno_csco, and de_nuke_csco.

variables.name: Steam Game Server Login Token
variables.description: A unique token obtained from Steam to authenticate your game server. Required for your server to appear in the server browser and for VAC protection. Get one at https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers

variables.name: Server Files Download URL
variables.description: The URL where the server files will be downloaded from during installation. Only modify this if the default CDN is unavailable.

variables.name: Maximum Players
variables.description: The maximum number of players allowed to connect to your server simultaneously. Recommended values are between 10-64 players depending on your server's resources.
